apiCalls.description: First edit - sets all_day=1 to work around RWGPS API quirk

headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

payload.desc:
Ride Leader: Albert Saporta



Arrive 9:45 AM for a 10:00 AM rollout.

All participants are assumed to have read and agreed to the clubs ride policy: https://www.sc3.club/rides/rides-policy

Note: When using a browser use the "Go to route" link below to open up the route.
payload.name: Fri B (3/1 10:00) CCP - Rancho San Vicente Open Space-Bald Peak-Calero Reservoir

response.name: Fri B (3/1 10:00) CCP - Rancho San Vicente Open Space-Bald Peak-Calero Reservoir
